alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan; Coleman; Concho; McCulloch; Runnels; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 8:16PM CDT until August 10 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Callahan County in west central Texas... Northwestern Brown County in west central Texas... Coleman County in west central Texas... Northwestern McCulloch County in west central Texas... South central Shackelford County in west central Texas... Southeastern Taylor County in west central Texas... Eastern Runnels County in west central Texas... Northeastern Concho County in west central Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 815 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Us-283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line to near Oplin to near Ballinger, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. 5 * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Baird, Novice and Oplin around 820 PM CDT. Putnam and Silver Valley around 830 PM CDT. Talpa and Rowden around 835 PM CDT. Glen Cove around 840 PM CDT. Atwell and Ivie Reservoir Near Concho Park Marina around 845 PM CDT. Leaday around 850 PM CDT. Valera around 855 PM CDT. Coleman, Cross Plains, Voss, Burkett and Stacy around 900 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Echo, Mozelle, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line, Lake Coleman, I-20 Near The Callahan- Eastland County Line, Admiral, Goldsboro, Lake Winters Lake, Fisk and Ballinger Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 299 and 323. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Callahan; Coleman; Concho; McCulloch; Runnels; Shackelford; Taylor
